Numbers are fun (Remix)

  • 30

In Chinese culture, 9 is a special number. What does it represent? It represents longevity. Mathematically, 9 is the square root of 81 and square of 3.Now is the magic time of the most mysterious number 9.

MAGIC 1

The digits of all multiples of 9 add up to 9 or a multiple of 9.
If you keep adding them until you only have one digit, it will always be 9.

9*9=81   (8+1=9)
9*137=1233   (1+2+3+3=9)
9*3641=32769   (3+2+7+6+9=27, then 2+7=9)

MAGIC 2

Take any three digit number, invert it and subtract the smaller number to form the larger number. The tens digit will always be 9.
Look!!!! Is magic time!!!!

542-245=297 (9 is the tens digit)
861-168=693 (9 is the tens digit)
954-459=495 (9 is the tens digit)

Do you know why? Let's do the subtraction in general!

abc-cba (a>c)
=100a+10b+c-100c-10b-a
=99(a-c) min possible value =1 and max possible value =8
99*1=99 (9 is the tens digit)
99*2=198 (9 is the tens digit)
99*3=297 (9 is the tens digit)
99*4=396 (9 is the tens digit)
99*5=495 (9 is the tens digit)
99*6=594 (9 is the tens digit)
99*7=693 (9 is the tens digit)
99*8=792 (9 is the tens digit)

Because all the possible values of 99(a-c) have 9 as the tens place, it can be always true.

MAGIC 3

Another miracle, see what happens when you multiple two magical numbers 9 and 7 together.
7*9=63
77*99=7623
777*999=776223
7777*9999=77762223
